alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 9:08PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CST... At 908 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Market to Huntsville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40-50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Skyline, Gurley, Alabama A And M University, New Market, Pleasant Groves, Hytop, and Maysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for north central Alabama...and Middle Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CST for northeastern Alabama.
